product.title: Snow Bugs | Book Club by Early Moments
product.ingress:
Now that everyone’s favorite industrious bugs have a small house, they are as snug as, well, snow bugs! So when it snows, they’re ready to play—almost. Watching the snow bugs prepare for snow fun is part of the fun, made even more appealing by the playful rhymes and pictures that Susan Schade and Jon Buller use to tell the story Snow Bugs.

Tie-in Activity: Hot day? Sit in the shade sipping cool drinks while you read this story together! Snow day? Curl up in a warm spot with warm drinks and read this story—after you’ve had some snow fun of your own.
